We’ve tested out dozens of online blackjack casinos to find the best Bitcoin blackjack sites for 2024:
Want to know more about the best Bitcoin blackjack sites? We’ve put together detailed reviews of our top picks to help players find the right casino site to join today.
Mega Dice is a cryptocurrency casino that lets users gamble and win money on Blackjack and other popular casino games.

Mega Dice has also made history as the first crypto online casino provider to provide licensed access to gambling, via Telegram. Existing users can use the Mega Dice Telegram Casino Bot to deposit crypto funds and execute their bets. This makes onboarding far easier as people can immediately deposit funds and start playing.

After signing up for Mega Dice, one can access many casino games, such as Blackjack. Mega Dice offers Blackjack games from Evolution, one of the top gaming providers in the online casino space. Users can enjoy Blackjack Live and Lightning Blackjack, and thousands of slot machines, play baccarat with Bitcoin, together with other table games, and game shows.

The platform also offers exciting bonuses to new members. For instance, users who make a minimum deposit of $20 can get a 200% matched deposit bonus on their first deposit. The maximum bonus goes up to 1 BTC. Mega Dice also offers 50 free spins on Wanted Dead or a Wild, a popular slot machine.

To avail the bonus, the deposit must be made within 30 days of creating a new account. Users also need to complete a 6x wagering requirement within 14 days of making the deposit. Deposits and withdrawals can be made with multiple cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Cardano (ADA), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), and Tron (TRX).

While the minimum deposit to extract the bonus is $20, one can start betting after depositing just $1. The platform allows withdrawals starting from only $10 and does not charge withdrawal commissions if the deposit has been wagered at least once. On Mega Dice, users will have to pay a $5 monthly inactivity fee.

A safe platform to use, Mega Dice is registered with the Curacao government. This online crypto casino is accessible in Australia and the United Kingdom. Since not all casinos are accessible in these regions, Mega Dice stands out from the competition.

One of the appealing features of playing blackjack on Lucky Block is that it caters to all types of players. Whether players want a quick hand in Blackjack Lobby on up the stakes on Blackjack Diamond VIP, This platform provides it all.

The other great feature is that players can play Free Bet Blackjack in the live casino. It offers a realistic experience, with the dealer referring to players by name. The vivid image makes players feel as if they’re at the table and only an arm’s length away from the dealer.

Players can place bets with Bitcoin or other cryptos such as Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin and several other popular cryptos. Only $1 is needed to begin betting, and players can even make deposits via bank transfer and debit/credit cards.

The sign-up process is quick, and Lucky Block offers a 15% cashback to players for their losses during the first week. The platform also offers 30 different sports games, eSports and a sportsbook. Players can bet on World Cup games, basketball, tennis and ice hockey.

Players will find everything from VIP blackjack to speed blackjack to Super 7 blackjack. BC.Game also has several live dealer blackjack tables, all of which are available to join 24/7. Live dealer blackjack is provided by Evolution Gaming, one of the world’s leading casino software providers.

What really stands out about BC.Game is the casino’s welcome bonus for new players. Players can earn up to $220,000 in BCD, BC.Game’s in-casino cryptocurrency token, over their first 4 deposits. This is by far the largest blackjack casino bonus we’ve seen for 2024.

The casino also has a wide range of ongoing promotions, including medals for returning players and a VIP program for the casino’s most loyal users. Check out our BC.Game review for more details about all of BC.Game’s promotions.

Wild.io makes payments simple. The casino accepts 10 of the most popular crypto tokens, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin. All crypto deposits and withdrawals are fee-free. Payouts are instant, so players don’t have to wait to claim their winnings.

Metaspins stands out for its unique and generous VIP program. The casino’s most loyal players can earn a rakeback up to 60% on losses. That means that more than half of the money that a player loses betting on blackjack with crypto is returned to them for another chance to win.

That’s a huge amount of money to start betting with, although it can be a little tricky to meet the bonus wagering requirement. After this initial bonus, players have to join Cloudbet’s VIP program to get additional bonuses for blackjack play. Check out our Cloudbet review for more details.

Want to know more about how to choose the best Bitcoin blackjack site? We’ll explain what we look for when evaluating top Bitcoin casino blackjack sites.

One of the first things we consider when considering the best Bitcoin blackjack sites is whether they offer secure crypto payments. The process of making deposits and withdrawals should be simple and safe, and tokens should reach their destination every time. All of the sites we reviewed offer highly secure crypto payment systems.

A major advantage to gambling with crypto is that payments are fast. Many of the top online crypto blackjack sites offer instant crypto deposits and withdrawals with no fees. Bitcoin withdrawals should never take more than 24 hours.
Blackjack casino bonuses can be worth a lot of money. BC.Game, for example, offers new players up to $220,000.

Be sure to look carefully at each blackjack site’s welcome bonus, including any terms and wagering requirements. Also be sure to consider reload bonuses and promotions for returning players that can add up over time.

The best Bitcoin blackjack sites offer fair minimum and maximum withdrawal limits. That means allowing players to withdraw from as little as 1 mBTC and up to 1 BTC or more at a time. High rollers should especially check withdrawal limits to ensure they will be able to move their money around with ease.

Of course, the selection of blackjack games is a major consideration when comparing blackjack casino sites. We look for casinos that offer plenty of variations on this classic game, such as European blackjack, multihand blackjack, 21 Burn, and more.

Live dealer blackjack tables bring the casino experience online. These tables often offer higher betting limits and interaction with other players. Many of the best crypto blackjack sites offer live dealer tables.
We looked for sites with responsive customer support that could address any issues or inquiries promptly. Live chat, email, and phone support are all beneficial.

We verified that the site accepts Bitcoin (BTC) as a payment method for deposits and withdrawals. As a bonus, we looked for sites that also support other cryptocurrencies like Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), or Bitcoin Cash (BCH).

We chose sites that are licensed and regulated by reputable gambling authorities. This ensures adherence to strict standards for fair gaming, player protection, and responsible gambling practices.
We also took into account user reviews and ratings from reputable sources to gauge the community’s experience with the site. Positive feedback regarding reliability, security, and fairness is a good indicator that this is a reliable Bitcoin blackjack site.

The legality of Bitcoin blackjack sites depends on the jurisdiction you are in. Gambling laws vary significantly from country to country, and adding cryptocurrency as a means of transaction adds another layer of complexity.

If you’re considering using a Bitcoin blackjack site, it is crucial to first research the gambling and cryptocurrency laws in your specific area. In some cases, it may also be wise to consult with a legal professional to understand the full scope of the laws and regulations that apply to Bitcoin gambling in your jurisdiction.
Choosing Bitcoin blackjack over traditional fiat currency blackjack offers several advantages that may appeal to players:

Bitcoin transactions typically process faster compared to traditional fiat currency methods. This means players can deposit funds into their accounts quickly and start playing almost immediately. Withdrawals are also often processed more swiftly, allowing players to access their winnings sooner.

Some Bitcoin blackjack sites may offer lower house edges compared to traditional online casinos. A lower house edge increases the player’s chances of winning over the long term, potentially leading to higher profits.

Bitcoin blackjack sites often offer larger bonuses and promotions compared to fiat currency casinos. These bonuses may include deposit bonuses, free spins, and cashback rewards, providing players with additional opportunities to win.

Bitcoin transactions offer a higher level of anonymity compared to traditional banking methods. While Bitcoin transactions are recorded on a public ledger, they do not require personal information such as name, address, or credit card details. This anonymity can appeal to players who prioritize privacy and security
Bitcoin blackjack sites can be accessed from anywhere in the world, providing players with greater flexibility and accessibility, no matter what their geographic location is.

Playing blackjack with Bitcoin eliminates the need for currency conversion fees, which are often incurred when depositing and withdrawing funds in different fiat currencies. This can result in cost savings for international players.

Crypto casino bonuses for blackjack and other table games can be worth a lot of money to the player and help reduce the house edge. So, it’s important for players to understand what types of bonuses are available and how they work:

The most common type of bonus players will see for blackjack is a deposit match bonus. With this type of bonus, players are required to make a deposit. The bonus they receive is calculated based on their deposit, up to the bonus maximum.

As an example, let’s look at BC.Game’s welcome bonus. New players receive a 180% deposit match up to a maximum of $20,000 (paid in BCD). So, if a player deposits $10,000 in Bitcoin, they’ll receive $18,000 in bonus BCD.
Cloudbet and Bitslot also offer deposit match bonuses for new players. At Cloudbet, the welcome bonus is a 100% match worth up to 5 BTC. At Bitslot, it’s a 150% match worth up to 2 BTC.

No deposit bonus offers are relatively rare among Bitcoin casinos. These types of bonuses don’t require players to make a deposit. They just have to create a casino account and they’ll automatically receive bonus funds to start betting with.

No deposit bonuses usually come in the form of free spins on slot games and cannot be used for playing blackjack. However, players may occasionally find free chips or no deposit bonus cash that can be used to bet on blackjack risk-free.

VIP programs are a way for crypto blackjack casinos to reward loyal players. At most crypto casinos, players are automatically enrolled in a VIP program once they wager a certain amount. The more a player wagers at the casino, the higher they move up in the casino’s VIP tiers.

VIP programs offer a range of benefits, including higher betting limits and priority customer support. They also often include reload deposit match bonuses, cashback on losses, or free chips for betting on blackjack games. Every VIP program is different, so be sure to check what perks are available when choosing the best Bitcoin blackjack site.
Here are the welcome bonus offers at the best Bitcoin blackjack sites for 2024:

Blackjack is one of the most popular casino games in history, and many variations on the original blackjack game have developed. We’ll take a closer look at some of the most popular Bitcoin blackjack games players will find at the casinos we reviewed.

Multihand blackjack is simply blackjack played with 2, 3, or 4 decks. Playing with more decks is important because there are more copies of each card in the game. So, just because 1 player has an ace doesn’t mean that other players or the dealer can’t also get aces.

Single deck blackjack is played with just a single deck. There’s a lot of strategy involved in this variation because players know what cards are left in the deck based on what’s showing on the table. So, players can figure out the likelihood that they’ll go over 21 if they choose to hit.

European blackjack is pretty close to the standard blackjack game, but with a small twist. The dealer is not required to check whether they have blackjack after the initial deal. If the dealer has blackjack, that wins out over any player that has 21 but not from a blackjack.

Vegas Strip blackjack is one of the most popular variants on this classic game. Players are allowed to double down on either of their cards from the initial deal and can split up to 4 hands. They can also split any 10-point cards even if they aren’t the same card, so there are more opportunities to split hands.

Live Bitcoin blackjack is one of the most popular ways to play blackjack online. Tables at a Bitcoin live casino have human dealers on camera, with players flanked by other casino customers from around the world. It’s very similar to playing blackjack in a Las Vegas casino.

Players can talk to one another through a chat function and speak directly to the dealer. It’s possible to see what cards other players have, which can influence a player’s decisions if there are only 1 or 2 decks in play.
Live Bitcoin blackjack games may also have higher betting limits, but this varies by casino.
Before players can start betting with Bitcoin, they need to get their hands on this popular cryptocurrency. The easiest way to do that is to use one of the best crypto exchanges.

A Bitcoin exchange is a platform that accepts fiat currency – in the form of credit cards, debit cards, or bank transfers – and exchanges it for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Users can then transfer their Bitcoin to a crypto wallet, and from there deposit it at one of the best Bitcoin blackjack sites.
Bitcoin exchanges have different fee structures and can be more or less easy to use, so it’s important to choose the right one.

The best crypto blackjack sites offer large bonuses, a wide selection of blackjack games, and seamless crypto payments. Join Lucky Block today to start betting on blackjack with Bitcoin – customers can benefit from a 200% initial deposit bonus.
Crypto blackjack is online blackjack in which players bet Bitcoin, Ethereum, or another cryptocurrency. Blackjack winnings are paid out in these cryptocurrencies.

Yes, a growing number of online casinos let players around the world bet on blackjack with crypto. Mega Dice offers more numerous blackjack games and accepts 10 cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin.

Blackjack works the same way whether players are betting with Bitcoin or putting chips on the table at a Vegas casino. To play blackjack with Bitcoin, players have to join an online crypto casino. The best Bitcoin blackjack site for 2024 is Mega Dice. It has virtual and live blackjack games and offers new players a welcome bonus. Lucky Block also accepts multiple cryptocurrencies in addition to Bitcoin.
